name: Attenda
tag_list: cloud-computing, virtualisation, green-it, critical-application-hosting, data-centre-operations, carbon-neutral-hosting, hosting, peer-1, rackspace, technology, web-hosting, cloud, iaas, saas, paas
overview:
Attenda is a specialist managed services solutions provider; founded in 1997 by co-founders Mark Fowle (CEO) and Simon Hansford (VP Service Strategy and Marketing), with the aim of hosting and maintaining itâ€™s clients IT systems so they could focus on the strategic projects rather than day-to-day operation of their IT infrastructure.

Attendaâ€™s business model is based upon Attenda M.O. Its shared operations platform that integrates people, process and technology to deliver high availability service levels at a cost that is amortised across Attendaâ€™s client base.

A sample of Attendaâ€™s clients include is bmi, easycar, Microsoft, NHS, St Jamesâ€™ Place and Travelodge

Attendaâ€™s Critical Application Hosting Service covers Enterprise Applications, Web Applications and Messaging & Collaboration systems. Furthermore, Attendaâ€™s IT infrastructure and Operations extend from the computer room and to complete adhering data centre to ITIL ISO 20000 certified IT Service Management System standards. Attenda is also single and multi-tenanted SaaS providers to Independent SoftwareVendors (ISVâ€™s) as well as Cloud (Infrastructure as a Service) platform providers.
